title: Globle
description: Search engine implementation for CIS 555: Internet and Web Systems. Set of services to crawl, index, rank, query, and visualize assets across the web.
technologies: Java, jQuery, AWS, S3, Apache Spark, MySQL, DynamoDB

title: Orthly
description: Assisted in building a landing page for Orthly: a company who provides invisible aligners to patients for a fraction of the cost of traditional methods like braces or Invisalign.

title: Insuricane
description: A short-term home insurance product for hurricanes built for PennApps F18. Leveraged machine learning algorithm trained on NOAA data to calculate risk of damages to assets and a hedging portfolio of shorts on correlated, publicly traded local utilities.
technologies: React, Redux, Google Maps API, Python, Google Cloud Platform, DocuSign API

title: Nalda
description: Web app for curated listings, articles, and videos for exploring cities through food.
technologies: Node, React, Redux, Google Maps API, Amazon S3, Passport, MongoDB

title: Flourish
description: Micro donation platform enabling millenials to make more impactful contributions.

title: The Metric
description: A publication with the aim to measure what's happening around the world through your voice.

title: Love Sylvie
description: Landing and referral page for a perfume startup focused on building an online brand.

title: AR Textiles
description: Website for a Textiles Company. English and Spanish translations.

title: YouthHack
description: Website for a YouthHack: an organization dedicated to building student entrepreneurs.

title: Blackwelder Coffee
description: Website for a coffee company based in Los Angeles which sells its blends internationally.

title: Facebook Clone
description: Final project for NETS 212: Scalable Cloud Computing. Social media platform.
technologies: Node, React, CSS, JavaScript, Amazon DynamoDB, Map Reduce

title: Penn Q&A
description: Final project for CIS 350: Software Engineering. Question and answer platform for Penn students.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe
description: Implementation of Tic-Tac-Toe with the option to play against a CPU.
